description: '''Future bass''' is a style of [[electronic dance music]] which developed in the 2010s that mixes elements of [[dubstep]] and EDM [[Trap music (EDM)|trap]] with warmer, less abrasive rhythms. The genre was pioneered by producers such as [[Rustie]], [[Hudson Mohawke]], [[Lido (musician)|Lido]], [[San Holo]] and [[Cashmere Cat]], and it was popularised in the mid to late-2010s by artists such as [[Flume (musician)|Flume]], [[Martin Garrix]], [[Illenium]], [[Louis the Child (duo)|Louis the Child]] and [[Mura Masa]]. 2016 was seen as the breakout year for the genre.
